name: Victarion Grejoy
text: If you are attacking, all of your participating Ships (including supporting Greyjoy Ships) add +2 to combat strength instead of +1

name: Theon Greyjoy
text: If you are defending an area that contains either a Stronghold or a Castle, this card gains +1 combat strength and a sword icon

name: Balon Greyjoy
text: The printed combat strength of your opponent's House card is reduced to 0

name: Asha Greyjoy
text: If you are not being supported in this combat, this card gains two sword icons and one fortification icon

name: Aeron Damphair
text: You may immediately discard two of your available Power tokens to discard Aeron Damphair and choose a difference House Card from your hand (if able)

name: Tywin Lannister
text: If you win this combat, gain two power tokens

name: Tyrion Lannister
text: You may immediately cancel your opponent's House card and return it to his hand. He must then choose a difference House card to reveal. If he has no other House cards in hand, he cannot use a House card this comabat

name: Ser Kevan Lannister
text: If you are attacking, all of your participating Footman (including supporting Lannister footmen) add +2 combat strength instead of +1

name: Cersei Lannister
text: If you win this combat, you may remove one of the losing opponent's Order tokens from anywhere on the board

name: Mace Tyrell
text: Immediately destroy one of your opponent's attacking or defending Footmen unit's

name: Ser Loras Tyrell
text: If you are attacking and win this combat, move the March Order token used into the conquered area. The March Order may be resolved again later this round

name: Queen of Thorns
text: Immediately remove one of your opponent's Order tokens in any one area adjacent to the embattled area. You may not remove the March Order token used to start this combat

name: Robb Stark
text: If you win this combat, you may choose the area to which your opponent retreats. You must choose a legal area where your opponent loses the fewest units

name: Roose Bolton
text: If you lose this combat, return your entire House card discard pile into your hand (including this card)

name: The Blackfish
text: You do not take casulties in this combat from House card abilities, Combat icons, or Tides of Battle cards

name: Catelyn Stark
text: If you have a Defense Order token in the embattled area, its value is doubled

name: Stannis Baratheon
text: If your opponent has a higher position on the Iron Throne influence track than you, this card gains +1 combat strength

name: Kenly Baratheon
text: If you win this combat, you may upgrade one of your participating Footman (or one supporting Footman) to a Knight

name: Ser Davos Seaworth
text: If "Stannis Baratheon" is in your discard pile, this card gains +1 combat strength and a sword icon

name: Salladhor Saan
text: If you are being supported in this combat, the combat strength of all non-Baratheon Ships is reduced to 0

name: Patchface
text: After combat, you may look at your opponent's hand and discard one card of your choice

name: Nymeria Sand
text: If you are defending, this card gains a fortification icon. If you are attacking, this card gains a sword icon

name: Arianne Martell
text: If you are defending and lose this combat, your opponent may not move his units into the embattled area. They return to the area from which they marched. Your own units must still retreat

name: Doran Martell
text: Immediately move your opponent to the bottom of one influence track of your choice
